blog.name: widofjordweek
blog.title: Widofjord Week 2019
blog.description: june 16-22. let's make it work. check our twitter @widofjordweek for updates!

summary: Widofjord Week Prompts!
title: Widofjord Week Prompts!
body:
We’d like to thank everyone for submitting - because we got so many good ones, we’re going to be running two prompts per day so anyone who wants to participate has even more flexibility.

These prompts are meant to be interpreted in any way you see fit. You can use them to create fanart, fanfic, playlists, mood boards, graphics, poetry, etc!

June 16

  • Pining
  • Fluff

June 17

  • Insecurity
  • Intimacy

June 18

  • Canon Quote
  • Blood Pact

June 19

  • Promises
  • Instincts

June 20

  • Dreams / Nightmares
  • Fire and Water

June 21

  • Soulmates
  • Modern AU

June 22

  • Pride Month
  • Song Lyrics

Feel free to share previews/wips of your work, but save your final pieces for the day your piece is based on. Use the hashtag #widofjordweek2019 when you share your work so we can reblog your creations here!

As always, if you have any questions, feel free to send a message or ask ♥

blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

tags: that name is a fuckin keyboard smash why are you doing this to me max
summary: Max: "I guess you just don't give up, do you?  Our lord warned you of your mischief and vexatious diligence.  But you don't...
body:
Max: “I guess you just don’t give up, do you? Our lord warned you of your mischief and vexatious diligence. But you don’t recognize the one true god, no. You believe in unification of a world that’s been blinded, so beguiled by the truth that the blight is what this world needs. Like the fresh new flesh of a saddle, worlds were meant for breaking in. You must be wondering who I am. I am Bast'alar’s proud pet, Collin Crasja [[???]], and though our lord is unfathomable in his might, he is a very busy cat. So I thought I’d be a good boy and rattle the bars of your precious cage. What if your world was turned upside down, your precious stars fading like the life in your eyes and the dirt you walked on tilled for the second coming? Well let us find out, shall we? I cast a spell on you, and now you’re mine.”

Outro music: “Laura Bailey’s Yee-Haw Game Ranch! Yeehaw!”

[harp music]

[harp music]

So I thought I’d be a good boy and rattle the bars of your precious cage. What if your world was turned upside down, your precious stars fading like the life in your eyes and the dirt you walked on tilled for the second coming? Well let us find out, shall we? summary: hey, i rated critical role on imdb but it still says its at 4208 ratings? do i need to write a review for it to count or...
question: hey, i rated critical role on imdb but it still says its at 4208 ratings? do i need to write a review for it to count or something?
answer:
Oh no! That’s so weird… It should count any vote as long as you’re signed in, and you don’t have to write a review (there’s only 22 reviews for CR at the moment anyway). If you’re not signed in, you can still ‘rate’ it, but then it will redirect you to a sign-in page and not count it.

If it’s not counting the votes then I don’t know whats going on. That really sucks. :(

reblog.comment:

If it’s not counting the votes then I don’t know whats going on. That really sucks. :(

tags: i... guys i have so many feelings
summary: So “Let the Flames Begin” by Paramore played in the car today and all I could think about was the Bright Queen talking about how...
body:
So “Let the Flames Begin” by Paramore played in the car today and all I could think about was the Bright Queen talking about how many lives were lost in what has essentially become a Holy War for the Xhorhassians (though they are hardly innocent). Both sides see themselves as right and justified (particularly for the civilians and lower ranking officials that have no idea what kind of horrors are truly being committed). And honestly… it just made me really sad??? Like I love that song and I love the power and emotion behind it. And I… war doesn’t leave anyone’s hands clean. I just have a lot of feelings on this war.

I’m still in the car so I can’t fully flesh this out but LATER when I’m not jamming I will. This is just my screaming into the void.

summary:
Laura and Liam piloting Pike during the Thordak fight is utterally HILARIOUS given how we now know she played Clerics

Laura and Liam piloting Pike during the Thordak fight is utterally HILARIOUS given how we now know she played Clerics

Laura: Let’s have Pike cast Spiritual Weapon at 5th level for more damage

blog.name: i-mean-nevermind
blog.title: You don't know shit about Game of Thrones
blog.description: Katie//Austistic and Queer (bi, arospec, enby)//Basically a Critical Role blog and by that I mean Nott and Caleb fan blog

tags: shit i hope this isn't shady
just a passing observation in a fun format
summary:
Tired: “Caleb loves his goblin mom.”
Wired: “Caleb loves his weird little sister” because Caleb has never seen Nott as a mother...
body:
Tired: “Caleb loves his goblin mom.”
Wired: “Caleb loves his weird little sister” because Caleb has never seen Nott as a mother figure to him and instead has openly taken on a big-brotherly protective role which is allowed to co-exist with Nott’s maternal one because that’s how good, layered relationships are.

dialogue.name: Wired
dialogue.label: Wired:
dialogue.phrase: “Caleb loves his weird little sister” because Caleb has never seen Nott as a mother figure to him and instead has openly taken on a big-brotherly protective role which is allowed to co-exist with Nott’s maternal one because that’s how good, layered relationships are.
